column5: I have gout and it gives me fits sometimes.  I know a couple others here suffer too.  Don't know if anyone else is interested but someone at work showed me an article on a new study coming out for a gout treatment www.goutstudy.com

Eat cherries or drink cherry juice, doesn't matter if they're fresh, canned or frozen.  There's some chemical in the juice that dissolves the uric acid crystals and lets your system flush it out.  Black cherries are better but they all work.
